sheep.collision
Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
  sheep.collision.Shape
      sheep.collision.Polygon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Rectangle
public class Polygon
extends Shape

An implementation of the Shape class for general convex polygons. This class can (obviously) be used to represent or imitate common shapes, like rectangles or circles.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new Polygon from the array.

Constructor Detail

Polygon

public Polygon(float[] points)
Creates a new Polygon from the array. The array is packed with alternating x and y values, that is: {x0, y0, x1, y1, x2, y2, etc}.

Parameters:
points - The points from which to create the polygon.
Method Detail

update

public void update(float dt,
                   android.graphics.Matrix matrix)
Description copied from class: Shape
Updates the Shape according to the parent's transformation matrix. This can also be used to animate the Shape.

Specified by:
update in class Shape
Parameters:
dt - The timestep since last frame (in seconds).
matrix - The transformation matrix of the parent Sprite.

Projects this Shape onto the axis.

getBoundingBox

public BoundingBox getBoundingBox()
Description copied from class: Shape
Gets the BoundingBox of the Shape. This is used in particular during spatial partitioning to determine in which quadrant the Shape should be inserted.

Specified by:
getBoundingBox in class Shape
Returns:
The BoundingBox of the Shape.
